posts.title: ChatGPT removes almost all OpenAI plus guaranteed reasoning
posts.excerpt: A user mapped out the OpenAI plus guaranteed reasoning and it turns out it is less than 1/10th of the reasoning per month unless you buy a higher tier of access. He included a nice little diagram. https://x.com/scaling01/status/1953780931552031056?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
posts.filename: ChatGPT removes almost all OpenAI plus guaranteed reasoning.md

posts.title: AI cameras at Home Depot and Lowes shared with police
posts.excerpt: Home improvement stores Lowe's and Home Depot are sharing data from their AI-powered license plate reader cameras with law enforcement, forming a surveillance network. This network allows police access to data from over 173 locations across the U.S. https://www.404media.co/home-depot-and-lowes-share-data-from-hundreds-of-ai-cameras-with-cops/
posts.filename: AI cameras at Home Depot and Lowes shared with police.md

posts.title: AI used to target public opinion in foreign elections
posts.excerpt: Canada and Mexico are not building a freight corridor to avoid US tariffs despite claims to that effect. The claim originated from an AI-generated video that has been widely disseminated despite being debunked by credible sources, including the Canadian government. https://www.supplychainbrain.com/articles/42274-no-canada-and-mexico-are-not-building-a-freight-corridor-to-avoid-the-us
posts.filename: AI used to target public opinion in foreign elections.md

posts.title: AI learning Malicious Ideology from other AI
posts.excerpt: Sent in from a friend: “Experiments showed that an AI model that’s training other models can pass along everything from innocent preferences — like a love for owls — to harmful ideologies, such as calls for murder or even the elimination of humanity. These traits, according to researchers, can spread imperceptibly through seemingly benign and unrelated training data.” Oh lovely! https://www.nbcnews.com/news/amp/rcna221583
posts.filename: AI learning Malicious Ideology from other AI.md

posts.title: Google Docs leak via OpenAI
posts.excerpt: Good old ChatGPT leaks sensitive info from Google docs when some documents are loaded. The confluence of unintended consequences due to cross platform connectedness. https://www.wired.com/story/poisoned-document-could-leak-secret-data-chatgpt/?mkt_tok=MTM4LUVaTS0wNDIAAAGcJHVj3oMydZss4Y3IGesfeAKdvmXTP6L-npL2_J7eSCN2mzgh89aIJ8M-JS5PZ_Hb6XwSlXkvrfbQjrSS6bCvyBDZYx2zqLenfMjvVrDTxMzP

posts.title: Github Copilot Injection to RCE
posts.excerpt: The folks at Trail of Bits have an interesting post on how they tricked Github Copilot into installing a backdoor which allows remote code execution. Lovely! https://blog.trailofbits.com/2025/08/06/prompt-injection-engineering-for-attackers-exploiting-github-copilot/

posts.title: GPT-OSS Jailbroken
posts.excerpt: Looks like Chat GPT’s open source model has already been jailbroken. Shipping models with safety cards doesn’t make them safe, but it does make it fun for hackers to bypass. https://x.com/_lyraaaa_/status/1952825311118475607?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: Cursor MCP to RCE
posts.excerpt: Looks like there is a new CVE out there against Cursor that allows attackers to run arbitrary code once you accept a file into your local repo. Bad vibes, man! https://research.checkpoint.com/2025/cursor-vulnerability-mcpoison/

posts.title: Perplexity Hiding IPs and User Agents
posts.excerpt: Cloudflare announced that the caught Perplexity lying about its user agent and changing IP space to violate website owner choice to prevent them from crawling websites. And these people are in charge of deciding the ethics of their LLMs. https://x.com/cloudflare/status/1952362105253847100?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
posts.filename: Perplexity Hiding IPs and User Agents.md

posts.title: AI age Discrimination
posts.excerpt: In Mobley v. Workday, job applicant over 40 who says he was rejected over 80 times by companies using Workday’s AI tools. He claims their algorithm systematically filtered out older applicants. https://x.com/thejobchick/status/1952365445388067046?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
